climbIndicatorTooltipLoc: Fast ClimberThis player has been winning a lot. You might see them matched against higher ranked opponents.
autofillEnabledTooltipLoc:
Priority RolesOccasionally, you will be auto-assigned a Priority Role for queue health. We will ensure those matches are fair and give you extra rewards if you play well.
Role Fairness1. We try to match auto-assigned players by role.
2. If we can't, match the number of auto-assigned players.
Aegis of Valor Rewards Play out an autofill game with Mastery score C or higher:
1. Double LP for a win
2. No LP reduction on a loss
autofillProtectedTooltipLoc:
Playing out an autofilled game will guarantee your role selections for the next few games.

Priority role selections are guaranteed and will occasionally be eligible for an Aegis of Valor.
autofillModalCarryOverDescLoc: You were assigned a priority role, but the game did not start. Play it out and achieve a Mastery score of C or higher to earn an Aegis of Valor.
autofillModalDodgingDescLoc: Your priority role assignment will carryover if you leave. Play it out and achieve a Mastery score of C or higher to earn an Aegis of Valor.
autofillModalLpDescLoc:
Double LP for a win
No LP reduction on a loss
lpChangeValorAegisIconTooltipBodyLoc: Awarded for earning a C or higher when autofilled and occasionally for priority roles.
valorAegisPriorityRoleProtectionDesc1: Occasionally awarded for earning a C or higher on a priority role.
valorAegisPriorityRoleProtectionDesc2: Playing priority roles keeps the queue healthy. Thank you!
valorAegisAutofillProtectionDesc: Awarded for earning a C or higher in an autofill game.
